meanings.definition: Feedgrains: grains used as animal feed
meanings.sent1: The farmer bought a large bag of feedgrains for his livestock.
meanings.sent2: The feedgrains were stored in the barn to keep them dry.
meanings.sent3: The chickens had a party in the coop, celebrating the arrival of fresh feedgrains.
meanings.sent4: The fields swayed with the golden feedgrains, a feast for the animals.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the feedgrains filled the air, enticing the hungry cows.

meanings.definition: Feedgrains: to provide grains for feeding animals
meanings.sent1: The farmer will feedgrains to the chickens in the evening.
meanings.sent2: She feedgrains to the horses every morning before sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat tried to feedgrains to the cat, thinking it was a hungry chicken.
meanings.sent4: The fields seemed to feedgrains to the animals, flourishing with abundance.
meanings.sent5: The kind farmer always took the time to feedgrains to each animal with care.
